"Movie house, filming set of the film" Everyone knows it ", by Oscar winner Asghar Farhadi, in the Plaza Mayor of Torrelaguna. Through a beautiful staircase equipped with an electric stair lift, you access the first floor, where 6 bedrooms are distributed (3 with balconies over the main square), 1 toilet and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite to the main room, which also has dressing room, living room with fireplace and views of the main square. Torrelaguna is located in the northeast of the province and autonomous community of Madrid. This town is also known for being an important meeting point for motorcycle routes. It is located north of the capital of Spain, from which it is only separated by 53 km, and nine from the northern highway, the A-1 within its area of influence. Some of its tourist attractions: - Torrelaguna has been declared, in 1974, a National Historic-Artistic Monument and has several relevant buildings and structures, such as the Plaza Mayor or the parish church of Santa María Magdalena. - Iglesia Parroquial de la Magdalena, gothic from the 15th century, is one of the best examples in the community of Madrid.It was declared a Historic Artistic Monument on April 27, 1983. - Abbey of the Discalced Franciscan Conceptionist Mothers - Pósito-Ayuntamiento from 1515 and originally intended for a grain store is a relevant Cisnerian work that was reformed in the 18th and 19th centuries. - Wall, only a few remains remain, such as entrances and ramparts of what was a defensive wall and delimiting the town's jurisdiction, of medieval origin. Torrelaguna is located in the northeast of the province and autonomous community of Madrid, close to the border with the community of Castilla-La Mancha, with the province of Guadalajara, in the Valle del Jarama region. The town is located at an altitude of 740 m above sea level. n. m. 12 in a terrain with complicated orography surrounded by mountain ranges, Somosierra to the north and La Concha to the east. The Jarama River passes to the east, initially outside the municipal area, arriving, in the southeast, to act as a limit with Uceda; The Lozoya River passes through the north, close to the municipal area, dammed in the El Atazar reservoir. Valgallego recreational area It is located northeast of the Community of Madrid, 61 km from the capital, 9 km from the A-1, 55 km from Alcalá de Henares, and 50 km from Guadalajara. The location of the town, on the northern edge of the Southern Submeseta and at the foot of the Las Calerizas mountain range, provides it with an extreme continental climate with cold winters and hot summers. Temperatures range from over 30 degrees Celsius in summers to sub-zero temperatures in winter. It rarely snows, although it does snow more frequently in the hills located north of the town. The wind is usually from the north or southwest. Storms occur in spring and summer. Since ancient times, the town has been made up of seven neighborhoods, also called Granjerías, which are: Magdalena, San Vicente, San Quílez or Santo Domingo, La Floresta, San Sebastián, San Andrés and Las Huertas. In the north of the municipality is the urbanization of 'Los Tomillares'.

Upstairs by a comfortable staircase, large hall and distributor corridor with three large bedrooms, 5 rooms with storage rooms under cover. The guard house on the ground floor with a living room, kitchen with access to the garden, small cellar-storage room down a few steps and on the top floor with three bedrooms, bathroom and attic. Next to the house are the stables, warehouse and haystacks. The total m2 are 1064 (629 for housing, 372 for warehouses and 63 for various). Garden area with gazebo and pool hole. The house is cataloged with level 3 protection. The municipality of Torrelaguna is located in the middle Jarama Valley, northeast of the province of Madrid. Connected to Madrid Capital by interurban bus line 197, which covers the route between Torrelaguna and the Plaza Castilla interchange. Elegant stately home with striking historical features. Enviable town square location just 55km from Madrid. This unique stately townhouse is rich with history and stands just 40 minutes from central Madrid, with stunning original features that enhance its compelling charm. The building makes its stunning first impression with an impressive stone and brick facade and an unbeatable location in the heart of the town square, with views of the majestic 15th century gothic church. This expansive home spans a total built area of 480 sqm. The main residence features two floors and a large, covered patio. The expansive entrance hall is a masterpiece, with original stone floors and a broad, sweeping staircase. The residence boasts several living spaces and sitting rooms, some of which feature fireplaces, a large and elegant dining room, two kitchens, six bedrooms, two full bathroom suites and two WCs. The upstairs balconies directly overlook the town square and the covered patio area offers tremendous potential, with a vast range of possible uses. The jewel in this regal property’s crown is its unique cellar, a historical haven complete with antique rustic stone vats. The property also features a fully independent apartment with its own private hall, living room, kitchen, bedroom and full bathroom. The private, walled garden offers endless potential, a hidden sanctuary of peace and serenity right in the centre of town, perfect for outdoor dining on those balmy summer nights. The property’s handsome interiors are enhanced by striking details including original ceramic tiles and decorative hydraulic-pressed cement tiles, as well as stonemasonry and beautiful dark wood accents. This historical stately home dates back over a century, and is located in the picturesque town of Torrelaguna, just a stone’s throw from the Spanish capital with direct access via the A1 motorway.

Spectacular Country House located 60 km from the center of Madrid, with a pool and privileged views. Rústico y Rural is pleased to present this wonderful property with direct access to the countryside, very close to Madrid and with everything you need to enjoy with your family and friends. The property has an area of 30,000 m2 and there are about 300 m2 built, distributed in different buildings. The main house consists of about 170 m2, is distributed over two floors, and has 7 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, living room with fireplace, American kitchen and excellent views from all the main rooms. From the living room there is access to an impressive terrace, with a chill out area and a 3x3 jacuzzi. At the other end is the porch, with a dining area and built-in barbecue. Outside, a beautiful natural grass meadow predominates, which borders an impressive pool with impressive views. In the lower part of the property there is a beautiful wooden hut currently used as a games room, and a paddle tennis court of regulatory size. At the other end of the property there is a beautiful multipurpose room ideal for family gatherings. Above, an impressive solarium terrace with the best views of the mountains. The main characteristics of this property are the following: - 45 minutes from the center of Madrid - Almost 30,000 m2 of private and fenced property - Paved access to the farm gate - Built in the highest part, which guarantees impressive views of the entire mountain range - Outdoor pool, paddle tennis court, games room, built-in barbecue, room for events. - Main house with 7 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms - Ideal to exploit as rural accommodation Contact us for more information.
